message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would you be able to consider selling it to me for $100?

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from having this product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am still looking to stay within my budget. Could we perhaps agree on $95 for the product?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $105. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from having this product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget constraints. However, I am still unable to accept $105. Could we perhaps agree on $100 for the product?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go back to $100. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $115. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from having this product.
